title: Understanding Centralized Tagging
text: Centralized tagging involves managing tags from a single point, which can streamline processes but may also lead to bottlenecks.

title: Advantages of Centralized Tagging
text: Centralized tagging can ensure consistency and uniformity across the organization, making data easier to manage and search.

title: Disadvantages of Centralized Tagging
text: It can create a single point of failure and may slow down processes if the central system becomes overloaded.

title: Evaluating the Statement
text: Considering both the advantages and disadvantages, is the statement about centralized tagging true or false?
